```{r}

library(tidyverse)


compare_palette = c(
  "#b388eb",
  "#9F54A8",
  "#F5484A",
  "#FFC16A",
  "#FDA361"
)

table1 <- data.frame(nation=c("England","England","England","England","England","England","England"),
                     dataset=c("gdppr","hes","sus","test","test1","test2","test3"))


table1 %>% add_column(colours = rep(compare_palette, length.out=nrow(table1)))

data.frame(input_no = 2:1000) %>%
  add_column(colours = rep(compare_palette, length.out=nrow(.)))


```
